content:
衛生福利部民國107年7月20日 衛部秘字第1072161286號通知單註銷密等
In the labelling of antisera and cultures, the nomenclature recommended by the Enterobacteriaceae Subcommittee of the International Committee on Bacteriological Nomenclature (Int. Bull. Bact. Nomen. & Taxin., 1954, 4, 1-94) will be adopted, Where necessary earlier terms and synonyms may be included in the labelling when needed for clarity. Directions for the use of antisera and cultures will accompany them. The designation and acceptance of new serotyes will be made by mutual agreement between the two International Centres; w the actual nubering of serotypes will be made by one Centre only, namely, the Atlanta Centre, within the framework of the taxonomic and nomenclatural procedures established by the IAMS.
22th Academia Historici
- 9 -
54

In the labelling of antisera and cultures, the nomenclature recommended by the Enterobacteriaceae Subcommittee of the International Committee on Bacteriological Nomenclature (Int. Bull. Bact. Nomen. & Taxin., 1954, 4, 1-94) will be adopted, Where necessary earlier terms and synonyms may be included in the labelling when needed for clarity. Directions for the use of antisera and cultures will accompany them. The designation and acceptance of new serotyes will be made by mutual agreement between the two International Centres; w the actual nubering of serotypes will be made by one Centre only, namely, the Atlanta Centre, within the framework of the taxonomic and nomenclatural procedures established by the IAMS.
